item.title: My timer help plz
item.dc:creator: @burnout burnout
item.description:
@burnout wrote:

hey all im making a cwars timer and i need some help…

y the hell wont this go down seccond by seccond… it just instantly goes to 0…
what did i do wrong…

[CODE]if (castleWarsOn = false)
{
if((castleWarsOn = false) && (cwWait <= 0)){
castleWarsOn = true;
saraScore = 0;
zammyScore = 0;
cwTimer = 1800;
yell(“Another Castle Wars game has just started!!!”);}
else{
if((castleWarsOn = false) && (cwWait > 0)){
cwWait -= 1;}
}
}

if(castleWarsOn = true);
{
if ((castleWarsOn = true) && (cwTimer <= 0)){
castleWarsOn = false;
cwWait = 600;
yell(“Another Castle Wars game starts in 5 minuets!!”);}
else{
if ((castleWarsOn = true) && (cwTimer > 0)){
cwTimer -= 1;}
}
}
[/CODE]

Read full topic
